descmd: Trial-use ballot of Release 2 trial-use content. This ballot introduces substantive new features, numerous corrections, clarifications, and enhancements, and no breaking changes. Normative elements of the specification remain normative from a maturity perspective (i.e. normative aspects of the specification will not change in backwards-incompatible ways). New content introduced in this trial-use are marked as such, and trial-use content that was introduced in 1.5 remains trial-use in this version.
